summary: Black Rose by N8k converted to CBBE with TBBP support
descriptionHtml:
[center][img]http://imageshack.com/a/img13/2615/q4he.jpg[/img][/center]
[center][img]http://imageshack.com/a/img163/5796/0w7z.jpg[/img][/center]

[center][youtube]F4E2S-zgEo4&feature=share&list=PLLKPMBICNwokwIa4vyeRTJ0P1vINPJcIV[/youtube][/center]
[center]Skyrim Mods Review 18 by seriezs. Scroll to 5:18.[/center]

[B]Changelog:[/B]
*Added BBP and non-BBP/TBBP versions
*Fixed non-HDT heels version with boots clipping into ground

[B]Introduction:[/B]
This is my first conversion made to satisfy CBBE players that want the Black Rose outfit. The CBBE body in this mesh is a custom body made by using the BodySlide tool, hence it may differ greatly from the CBBE that you are using. Please make sure you have CBBE textures installed AND TBBP supported skeleton prior to using this. If you don't have the skeleton support your game [B]WILL CRASH[/B]. You have been warned ;)

For other versions of the armor please check here:

[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/46580/]The UNPB TBBP original version by N8k[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/47600/]The CHSBHC version made by gol[/url]

*The armour can be crafted at the forging station with leather materials.

Be sure to check my other mods out:
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/49350/]Latex Corset - CBBE TBBP with BODYSLIDE[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/50301/]Sexy Transparent Zipsuit - CBBE TBBP with BODYSLIDE[/url]

[B]Requirements:[/B]
[list]
[*]Any TBBP supported skeleton or [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/26800/]XP32 Maximum Skeleton -XPMS by xp32[/url]
[*][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/2666/]Textures that will fit the CBBE body[/url]
[*][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/36213/]If you choose the HDT heels version then install HDT heels system first[/url]
[/list]

[B]Installation:[/B]
[LIST]
[*]Download my modified mesh found in the files section.
[*]Install with NMM or simply drag and drop the files into their respective folders. Overwrite if necessary. (Always make a backup if you overwrite)
[/LIST]

[B]FAQ:[/B]
Q: Your armor sucks!
A: Thanks for checking it out and bye. Go do something else more productive than to complain in the posts.

Q: Your CBBE body is ugly. You should change it to what I like.
A: Its very subjective. I can never satisfy everyone. If you don't like it, then sorry your out of luck.

Q: My game crashed when I tried to equip the armor!
A: If you already have a TBBP compatible skeleton, then Reinstall your skeleton. Some mods like to include their own skeleton and may replace your TBBP-supported skeleton. Also make sure even your custom races have TBBP supported skeleton as well.

Q: Can you please convert to 7Base, UNP, other body shapes please?
A: Sorry no, since I don't use those bodyshapes I don't have any motivation to convert them. Hopfully others will, and if not you can always try to convert it yourself using Outfit Studio.

Q: There's clipping when I jump, sneak, run, hump, and make weird poses!
A: Since this armor is very closely layered to the body, it is inevitable that some clipping may occur. I tried my best in fixing all clipping but sometimes the weight copying/painting programs just doesn't want to do what I want. You can let me know and I'll see if I can fix it.

Q: There's clipping when I bodyslided to my custom body shape!
A: It does happen if you go over the values of 100% or have many things at 100%. It's not perfect, sorry but you will have to make your sizes smaller.

Q: What hair is that?
A: SG Hairpack. You will have to search for it yourself.

Q: How did you make the face of your character?
A: A lot of creativity and imagination using ECE (Enhanced Character Edit) which you can find here on the nexus.

Q: Will you make your character into a follower?
A: Sorry, no plans so far. Too busy imagining new armors and making them into reality (in game at least).

[B]Permissions:[/B]
Feel free to redistribute, modify the mesh and fix bugs if necessary but please credit the original author N8k and myself.


[B]Credits:[/B]
Calientes Beautiful Bodies Edition -CBBE- by Caliente
Bodyslide - 15 extra sliders for CBBE by moonballz
Black Rose - UNPB TBBP by N8k (original author of the file!)
author: nakrulz
